descriptionHtml:
[youtube]T-Y8pqZA19E[/youtube]

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
Pulley's Butterfly Mod by elysees

[b]Game Bayonetta : Accessories[/b]
Pulley's Butterfly : It is said that long ago, the witch Turandot crafted this treasure while in the service of the Queen of Lhasa, hoping that the butterfly would give users divine protection. Butterflies of Protection flutter around the bracelet's user, absorbing attacks on their behalf before breaking up.




[b]Pulley's Butterfly[/b]
-Auto learn
-Powers
-Summon Butterflies
-Requre : Magicka 15 per Butterfly
[b]OnHit > Recovery[/b]
:Restoration Stat Value per Butterfly [b](Do Not Defending Deadly Attacks !!)[/b]





[b]::Console Command::[/b]
If you want Recovery edit.
` > Set PulleyRecoveryRate to 1.0
default value 1.0 (1.0=100%)

If you want Requre Magicka edit.
` > Set PulleyMagicka to 15.0
default value 15.0 (15=Magicka 15)





*Feel free to use everything in this file.




::Review::
[youtube]F3k2fkf6biA[/youtube]
2:09
author: elysees
